mapper.insert: insert into cart( cart_idx, order_num, member_id, pr_idx, pr_code, pr_name, pr_price, pr_discount_price, pr_point, cart_status, member_ip, total_num ) values( #{cart_idx}, #{order_num}, #{member_id}, #{pr_idx}, #{pr_code}, #{pr_name}, #{pr_price}, #{pr_discount_price}, #{pr_point}, #{cart_status}, #{member_ip}, #{total_num} );
